main: ^Welcome, traveler. I sense a spark of curiosity within you. How may I assist you today?
^He is too dangerous to be kept alive. You consider attacking him

c-0: ^Ah, you possess a keen intuition. I am a seer, gifted with visions of the past, present, and future. I can offer you glimpses into hidden truths or foretell the outcome of your endeavors. Would you like some mystical assistance in your quest?
c-1: ^ can sense your aggression. He readies his spellbook.
^"Do it, you should be the only one able to wield magic" Attack him
^You channel your inner calm and stand down
c-2: ^I  hope I'll see you again, stranger.
